cbinstall.description: Core CB Menu and User Status tabs.

param.name: menuFormat
param.label: Menu display type
param.description: Menu can be displayed as a menubar, a list of menu links, or not displayed in this tab.

param.name: statusFormat
param.label: Status display type
param.description: Status can be displayed as a list or not displayed in this tab.

param.name: firstMenuName
param.label: First Menu Name
param.description: First menu name before "Edit". Default is "Community" = _UE_MENU_CB. Leave empty to not appear.

param.name: firstSubMenuName
param.label: First Sub-Menu Name
param.description: First sub-menu name. Default is "About Community Builder..." = _UE_MENU_ABOUT_CB. Leave empty to not appear.

param.name: secondSubMenuName
param.label: Second Sub-Menu Name
param.description: First sub-menu name. Leave empty to not appear.

param.default: Display Settings: Hits, Online, Member since, last online, last updated on have moved to core Community Builder fields, see fields management.
